code: const url='https://api-bfk4.onrender.com';const editProduct=async(cod,description,size,id)=>{const response=await fetch("".concat(url,"/editar/").concat(id),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','cookies':localStorage.getItem('jwt')},body:JSON.stringify({cod,description,size}),credentials:'include'});const data=await response.json();return data;};export default editProduct;
